Package com.samysadi.acs.utility.factory

This package contains definitions for different factories.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FailuresFactory.FailureEvent
    An event that is scheduled to generate a failure.
    FailuresFactory.FailureRepairEvent  
    FailuresFactory.RepairEvent
    An event that is scheduled to generate a repair.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CloudProviderFactory  
    CloudProviderFactoryDefault  
    Factory
    This Factory contains methods to create instances of different classes, accordingly to a given configuration.
    FactoryUtils
    A class containing static utility methods.
    FailuresFactory  
    FailuresFactoryDefault
    This implementation generates failures and reparations with a Exponential probability for each FailureProneEntity based the mtbf and mtbr in their configuration.
    SimulatorFactory  
    SimulatorFactoryDefault  
    TopologyFactory
    Defines a factory for generating hosts and the network interconnection between them.
    TopologyFactoryFlat
    This TopologyFactory can be used to generated a given number of hosts that are all interconnected.
    TopologyFactoryHierarchical
    This TopologyFactory can be used to generate a hierarchical tree topology, where hosts (leafs of the tree) are connected to each other through a given number (and levels) of switches.
    TraceFactory  
    TraceFactoryDefault  
    UserFactory  
    UserFactoryDefault  
    VirtualMachineFactory  
    VirtualMachineFactoryDefault  

Package com.samysadi.acs.utility.factory Description

This package contains definitions for different factories.
